_comment: Keep file encoded with UTF-8 to support chat formatting http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes
shetiphiancore.team.create.fail.inteam: You must leave your current team first
shetiphiancore.team.create.fail.exists: A team with that name already exists
shetiphiancore.team.rename.fail.same: Rename aborted; new and old names match
shetiphiancore.team.invite.send.fail.pen: Player already has a pending team invite to '%1$s'
shetiphiancore.team.invite.receive.notic: You have been invited to join '%1$s' (use %2$s within the next %3$s minutes to accept)
shetiphiancore.team.invite.accept.succes: You are now a member of '%1$s'
shetiphiancore.team.invite.accept.fail.p: Could not join as the player who invited you no longer has permissions to add members
shetiphiancore.team.invite.accept.fail.m: You are already a member of this team
shetiphiancore.team.invite.accept.fail.i: Can not accept an invite while in a team
shetiphiancore.team.invite.accept.fail.n: There are no open team invites to accept
shetiphiancore.team.leave.fail.leader: You must transfer leadership first or disband the team instead
shetiphiancore.team.kick.success: Player was kicked from the team
shetiphiancore.team.kick.success.notice: You have been kicked from your team
shetiphiancore.team.kick.fail.rank: You can only kick player of lower rank
shetiphiancore.team.kick.fail.team: That player is not a member of your team
shetiphiancore.team.rank.promote.success: You have been promoted to a team manager
shetiphiancore.team.rank.promote.fail.no: Can not promote a player who isn't a member
You have been demoted and are no longer a team manager
shetiphiancore.team.transfer.success.not: You are now the leader of '%1$s'
shetiphiancore.team.transfer.fail.same: Transfer aborted: user is already leader
shetiphiancore.team.error.no_team: You are not in a team
shetiphiancore.team.error.not_leader: You are not the team leader
shetiphiancore.team.error.not_manager.se: You are not a team manager
shetiphiancore.team.error.not_manager.ot: Player is not a team manager
shetiphiancore.team.sysadmin.kick.succes: %1$s player(s) have been removed from their teams
shetiphiancore.team.sysadmin.kick.inform: An admin has removed you from '%1$s'
shetiphiancore.team.sysadmin.transfer.su: Leadership of '%1$s' has been transferred to '%2$s'
shetiphiancore.team.sysadmin.disband.suc: '%1$s' has been disbanded, all players have been kicked
shetiphiancore.team.sysadmin.disband.inf: An admin disbanded '%1$s', you are no longer in a team
